dcterms:creator: Google-Deepmind
dcterms:description: A visual control domain from the DeepMind C-suite library of continuing environments where the agent controls a paddle to collect falling objects, with non-stationarity induced by randomly swapping entries in the observation.
dcterms:title: Non-stationary Catch

dcterms:creator: Andrew G. Barto
Richard S. Sutton
Charles W. Anderson
dcterms:description: A classic control task where the agent balances a pole on a cart, receiving rewards for maintaining balance and facing penalties for falling.
dcterms:title: Continuing Cart-pole

dcterms:creator: Emmanouil Antonios Platanios
Abulhair Saparov
Tom Mitchell
dcterms:description: An infinite two-dimensional grid world filled with items, where the agent adapts to a procedurally generated environment with changing rewards.
dcterms:title: Jelly Bean World

dcterms:creator: Yuval Tassa
Yotam Doron
Alistair Muldal
Tom Erez
Yazhe Li
Diego de Las Casas
David Budden
Abbas Abdolmaleki
Josh Merel
Andrew Lefrancq
Timothy Lillicrap
Martin Riedmiller
dcterms:description: A suite of continuous control environments designed for deep reinforcement learning research, featuring various tasks and challenges.
dcterms:title: DeepMind Control Suite
